definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: It is sufficient that it may be the possible convent, that I should take notice of it.
sentences.chinese: 只要那是可能存在的修院，就足已使我加以重視了。

sentences.english: He resolved to quit the convent.
It was thus that Jean Valjean quitted the convent of the Perpetual Adoration.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓便這樣離開了那永敬會修院。

sentences.english: Year on top of the island in 969 years to build a Benedictine monastery.
sentences.chinese: 公元969年在島頂上建造了本篤會隱修院。

sentences.english: Hidden among the constellations etched into in the Father's monastery is a wolf.
sentences.chinese: “父親”隱修院上蝕刻的星座圖裏隱藏着一匹狼。

sentences.english: A convent is a contradiction. Its object, salvation; its means thereto, sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 修院是一種矛盾，其目的是爲了幸福，其方式是犧牲。

sentences.english: A convent is a contradiction. Its object, salvation; its means thereto , sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 修院是一種矛盾，其目的是爲了幸福，其方式是犧牲。

sentences.english: Why had Jean Valjean quitted the convent of the Petit-Picpus?
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓爲什麼要離開小比克布斯修院呢？

sentences.english: It is in consequence of this decay that the convent gave up the education of girls.
sentences.chinese: 正是由於那種蕭條，修院才放棄了對小姑娘們的教養。
